name: Bug Frieakxer
description:
A 2,5 D fantasy medieval game where you are NOT the hero of the story but a programmer that has to fix and repair all the bugs of the game, in order to make the game enjoyable by future heroes of the adventure.

This game has been made in 48 hours during the Global Game Jam 2020.

Credits: 

DESIGNERS:

Mazzari Matteo

Berton Arrigo
